Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class FhirUtils

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.FhirUtils
public class FhirUtils extends Object
This static class implements a number of utility functions for working with FHIR Data types
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource)
      Returns true if the given Resource is empty or null
      Parameters:
      resource - The FHIR Resource to check
      Returns:
      true if the given FHIR resource is empty or null, false otherwise

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type fhirType)
      Returns true if the given FHIR type is empty or null
      Parameters:
      fhirType - The FHIR datatype to check
      Returns:
      true if the given FHIR type is empty or null, false otherwise

    • ifNotEmpty

      public static <T extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type> void ifNotEmpty(T type, Consumer<T> action)
      This is a convenience method to enabling actions to be written more simply. 
                      // Instead of
                if (isNotEmpty(identifier) {
                        patient.addIdentifier(identifier);
                }
                // Use
                ifNotEmpty(identifier, patient::addIdentifier);
      Type Parameters:
      T - The FHIR type to check
      Parameters:
      type - The type object
      action - The action to perform

    • setDataAbsentReason

      public static void setDataAbsentReason(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.PrimitiveType<?> element, String reason)
      Add a DataAbsent reason to a FHIR primitive type
      Parameters:
      element - The FHIR type to set as absent
      reason - The reason the data is absent

    • setDataAbsent

      public static void setDataAbsent(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.PrimitiveType<?> reason)
      Add a DataAbsent reason of "unknown" to a FHIR primitive type This is used when data is not provided within a V2 message.
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason the data is absent

    • setDataAbsentFromNullFlavor

      public static void setDataAbsentFromNullFlavor(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.PrimitiveType<?> type, String code)
      Set a Data Absent Reason extension on a primitive type based on coding from the NullFlavor vocabulary.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to add the extension to
      code - The Null Flavor code

    • isEmpty

      public static boolean isEmpty(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Structure structure)
      Returns true if the structure is empty or cannot be parsed
      Parameters:
      structure - The structure to check.
      Returns:
      true if the structure is empty or cannot be parsed, false otherwise
